chunks.zh: 你二刷过哪些电影？
chunks.en: Which movies have you seen twice?

chunks.zh: 定义一下，二刷指电影上映期间购票在影厅看的。
chunks.en: Let's define 'seeing twice': it means buying a ticket and watching it in the cinema during the movie's release.

chunks.zh: 从我个人的角度，二次上映再去看的应该不算，比如泰坦尼克号这种隔年为单位的重映（二次上映还看两遍的也算二刷）
chunks.en: From my personal perspective, watching it again during a re-release shouldn't count, like Titanic's re-release after years (but watching it twice during the re-release still counts as seeing it twice).

chunks.zh:
回想了一下自己，大概二刷的只有：
盗梦空间
疯狂动物城
我不是药神
让子弹飞（这个其实是分别看了四川话版和普通话版）
阿凡达 1 （首次上映先后看了 2D 和 3D ）
战狼 2
白蛇·缘起（这个其实二刷是陪朋友去看的）
美人鱼
大圣归来
哪吒 2
chunks.en:
Thinking back, the movies I've seen twice are probably only:
Inception
Zootopia
Dying to Survive
Let the Bullets Fly (I actually watched the Sichuan dialect version and the Mandarin version separately)
Avatar 1 (I watched the 2D and 3D versions successively during the initial release)
Wolf Warrior 2
White Snake (I actually watched this a second time with a friend)
The Mermaid
Monkey King: Hero Is Back
Ne Zha 2

chunks.zh: 流浪地球 2
chunks.en: The Wandering Earth 2

chunks.zh: 星际穿越 电影院里两次 电脑上 n 次，现在还存着将近 100G 的蓝光原盘的资源
chunks.en: Interstellar, twice in the cinema, n times on the computer, and now I still have nearly 100G of Blu-ray source files stored.

chunks.zh: 如果不是陪别人看我看过的，否则从不二刷
chunks.en: I never see a movie twice unless I'm accompanying someone.

chunks.zh: 这个定义二刷挺恶心的, 还以为是说喜欢的电影, 结果还得限制电影院?
chunks.en: This definition of seeing twice is quite annoying. I thought it was about favorite movies, but it's limited to cinemas?

chunks.zh: 那你标题为啥不写? <你在电影院二刷过哪些电影?>进来被恶心了
chunks.en: Then why didn't you write it in the title? <Which movies have you seen twice in the cinema?> I came in and got disgusted.

chunks.zh: 肖申克的救赎，电脑上 n 刷
